questions.question_text: An engineer needs to generate a report on all phones based on their directory numbers. Which shows the correct menu path for completing this task?

discussion.content: D. Bulk Administration > Phones > Generate Phone Reports

choices.D: Bulk Administration > Phones > Generate Phone Reports D

questions.question_text: A user reports that when they receive a voicemail on their phone, they do not receive it in their email as well. Which feature on Cisco Unity Connection should be checked?
Users report volume issues with recordings in Cisco Unity Connection. Which feature can be disabled to prohibit automatic volume adjustments to recordings?
Which option allows an engineer to deploy new firmware to a single phone, while reducing possible impact?

choices.A: Define a new firmware load on specific device. Save configuration and reset individual device.
choices.B: Define load in device defaults. Reset Device Pool.
choices.C: Upload firmware to TFTP server. Restart TFTP service.

discussion.content: A. Define a new firmware load on specific device. Save configuration and reset individual device.

questions.question_text: An administrator wants to verify that a new PRI is properly connected to the PSTN status. Which Layer 2 status should be seen?

discussion.content:
CME_MAIN#sh isdn status
Global ISDN Switchtype = primary-ni
ISDN Serial2/0:15 interface
 dsl 0, interface ISDN Switchtype = primary-ni
 Layer 1 Status:
 ACTIVE
 Layer 2 Status:
 TEI = 0, Ces = 1, SAPI = 0, State = MULTIPLE_FRAME_ESTABLISHED
 Layer 3 Status:
 0 Active Layer 3 Call(s)
 Active dsl 0 CCBs = 0
 The Free Channel Mask: 0xFFFF7FFF
 Number of L2 Discards = 2, L2 Session ID = 173
 Total Allocated ISDN CCBs = 0
